options.content: ACME corporation's e-commerce KPI dashboard provides a detailed overview of the company's website's performance by displaying critical metrics related to downtime, payment failures, and response times. The dashboard is designed to give executives and stakeholders real-time visibility into the website's performance and highlight areas that require attention.

targets.expr: vector(1)
vector(25)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service_name=~"$workload"}[1m])) by (le)) * 1
vector(25)
sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service_name=~"$workload"}[1m]))
{cluster="cloud",container=~"$workload"} |~ "critical|Critical|CRITICAL|error|Error|ERROR|exception|Exception|EXCEPTION|fail|Fail|FAIL|fatal|Fatal|FATAL"
{cluster="cloud",container=~"$workload"} | logfmt != "healthz"
sum by(container) (kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="integrations/kubernetes/kube-state-metrics", container="$workload"})
sum(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="integrations/kubernetes/kube-state-metrics", container="$workload"})

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor", cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor", cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))

(avg(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="integrations/kubernetes/cadvisor", cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="cloud", namespace="mltdemo", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))
